structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

law.text: The commissioner may promulgate administrative regulations in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A to implement the provisions of KRS 234.270 to 234.302.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 504, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
